post.description: If an error is encountered while syncing transactions with a source (ex. Plaid),  an HTTP POST request with a body following this schema will be sent to your  registered webhook URL.
Upon successful completion of a transaction sync with a source (ex. Plaid),  an HTTP POST request with a body following this schema will be sent to your  registered webhook URL.

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

debit_total.title: Debit Total
debit_total.description: The sum debit amount of the ledger.

children.title: Children
children.description: A list of child cash flow ledgers

debit_amount.title: Debit Amount
debit_amount.description: The debit amount of the line entry.

datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: The datetime that the line entry occurred.

ledgers.title: Ledgers
ledgers.description: A list of ledgers that are included in this chart of accounts.

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

transaction_id.title: Transaction Id
transaction_id.description: The transaction ID associated with the line entry.

related_line_entry_id.title: Related Line Entry Id
related_line_entry_id.description: The line entry ID of a related line entry.

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether this line entry may be edited by the user.

datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: The datetime that the line entry occurred.

datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: Date that the journal entry occurred

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether line entries in this ledger may be edited by the user.

financial_account_type.description: The type of financial account represented by the ledger.

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: Indicates whether this is a required ledger for all users.

report_cash_flow.title: Report Cash Flow
report_cash_flow.description: Indicates entries in the ledger should be included in the cash flow report.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: Indicates the id of the parent ledger if this is a sub-ledger

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The inclusive start date of the statement.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The inclusive end date of the statement.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this statement's ledger.

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The sum of line entry amounts in the statement for the statement period.

opening_balance.title: Opening Balance
opening_balance.description: The balance just before the statement period.

closing_balance.title: Closing Balance
closing_balance.description: The balance at the end of the statement period.

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether this ledger may be edited by the user.

report_cash_flow.title: Report Cash Flow
report_cash_flow.description: Indicates entries in the ledger should be included in the cash flow report.

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: Indicates whether this ledger is required to exist in the template.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: The ID of the parent ledger template

children.title: Children
children.description: A list of child ledger templates

create.title: Create
create.description: New line entries to be created

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the line entry to update.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The updated amount of the line entry.

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.
Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The sum of line entry amounts in the statement for the statement period.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the transaction. The ID is unique per ledger.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Any metadata that you would like to associate with the transaction. This metadata will be available to the auto-categorization pipeline for assistance in properly categorizing the transaction automatically. This metadata is entirely configurable by you; this parameter will accept any key-value pairs you care to submit with the transaction for later use.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the transaction. The ID is unique per ledger.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Any metadata that you would like to associate with the transaction. This metadata will be available to the auto-categorization pipeline for assistance in properly categorizing the transaction automatically. This metadata is entirely configurable by you; this parameter will accept any key-value pairs you care to submit with the transaction for later use.

created_datetime.title: Created Datetime
created_datetime.description: The date the transaction processing object was created.

updated_datetime.title: Updated Datetime
updated_datetime.description: The date the transaction processing object was last updated.

error.title: Error
error.description: Any error that was encountered while processing transactions.

entries_start.title: Entries Start
entries_start.description: The earliest possible datetime for the user's journal entries

first_transaction_datetime.title: First Transaction Datetime
first_transaction_datetime.description: The datetime of the first transaction.

last_transaction_datetime.title: Last Transaction Datetime
last_transaction_datetime.description: The datetime of the last transaction.

num_transactions.title: Num Transactions
num_transactions.description: The number of transactions for the user.
